name: our-garden
description: a community garden server and app develop to help forming and managing urban and community garden efforts and organizations

NEO4J_URI.description: The bolt endpoint for your neo4j database. For example: bolt://grandstack.io:7687

NEO4J_USER.description: The database user that the API application will use to connect to Neo4j

NEO4J_PASSWORD.description: The password for the provided Neo4j database user
